item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-09-26
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: The Stupidest Article About Social Media Ever [ or the smartest ] (via @stevegarfield) #
  • I'm at Stephi's on Tremont (571 Tremont St, Union Park, Boston). #
  • I'm at Tremont 647 (647 Tremont St, W Brookline St, Roxbury). #
  • IFC is showing the original "The Prisoner". Is it sad of me that the first thing I thought of was it's just like that one Simpsons episode! #
  • I'm at Flour Bakery & Cafe (Fort Point) (12 Farnsworth Street, Boston). #
  • Sitting in the shade with puppy, it's too cold for September. #
  • photo.jpg #
  • Fremont Street Experience #
  • Sticky bun @ Flour #

Powered by Twitter Tools
